price: 103. Il y a certes là un Signe évident, mais la plupart d’entre eux ne sont pas croyants.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
